content.value:
IT'S HERE!!!! #NottTechParty🎄

The Nottingham Tech Community Christmas Party 🙌🏼

Join us for an awesome evening of games and comedy with @WiFiWarsUK and a chance to win a Nintendo Switch Lite!

Tickets on sale on Friday at noon! 🎟🎉

Details and tickets: nott.tech/xmas20
